entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
